name: Cat's Eye Castle (2020)
description:
The king of Cat's Eye Castle has been corrupted. Fearing for your lives, you and your younger brother flee the kingdom - leaving it in ruins. 

You're just a child.

But the time for running is over. If hope is to be found, Cat's Eye Castle must be reclaimed.

And it will take the courage of a young girls heart to face the tragedies which lie beyond its walls...
